title: AI-Powered Chatbot System
description: Developed an advanced chatbot system using large language models and natural language processing. Implemented context-aware responses and integrated with multiple data sources for enhanced user interaction.

title: Data Analysis Pipeline
description: Built an automated data analysis pipeline for processing and analyzing large-scale datasets. Implemented data cleaning, feature engineering, and visualization components with a focus on scalability.

title: Machine Learning Research
description: Conducted research on advanced machine learning techniques, focusing on natural language processing and computer vision applications. Published findings and developed proof-of-concept implementations.

title: Statistical Analysis Tools
description: Developed a suite of statistical analysis tools for data scientists, including implementations of advanced statistical methods and interactive visualization components.

title: Recipe Finder
description: A recipe search application that allows users to find recipes based on ingredients they have. Includes filtering by dietary restrictions and meal type.
